CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 29, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Deep are the Roots - Scenes like this are healthy for America, where many groups are attempting to make democracy a working proposition despite the fact that other groups are working overtime to keep the Nation divided. The faculty and Parent Teacher Association at A. Leo Weil School forge ahead as they encourage interracial good-will. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Children playing on jungle gym and tricycles in playground of A. Leo Weil School, Hill District
